message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I'm thinking of selling it to you for $200.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the interest, but I am only able to pay up to $150 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. How about we meet in the middle at $180?
I appreciate your response, but I am still unable to meet at $180. Would you consider $160?
I'm not willing to go as low as $160, but I'm willing to meet you at $170. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
